item.title: 爲什麼我把這個又寫了一遍
item.description:
When working with complexes, many diagrams commute only up to homotopy. In order to have these diagrams actually commute, one need to work in a category where homotopy equivalences become isomorphisms.

GTM 281的這句話成爲了我的今日笑點。（你的笑點好奇怪。）我在前面寫過一則關於homotopy category的札記，然後因爲MathJaX配置問題一氣之下把它給刪了，現在只好重寫（……）先引用GTM281的記號：
